column1: Your community is currently in "Production Mode". We recommend that you momentarily switch your site to "Development Mode" so that the CSS of this plugin renders fine as soon as the plugin is installed. After completely installing this plugin and visiting few pages of your site, you may again change the System Mode back to "Production Mode" from the Admin Panel Home. (In Production Mode, caching prevents CSS of new plugins to be rendered immediately after installation.)
column2: Your community is currently in "Production Mode". We recommend that you momentarily switch your site to "Development Mode" so that the CSS of this plugin renders fine as soon as the plugin is installed. After completely installing this plugin and visiting few circles of your site, you may again change the System Mode back to "Production Mode" from the Admin Panel Home. (In Production Mode, caching prevents CSS of new plugins to be rendered immediately after installation.)

column1: Enable Embeddable Badges / Like Box for the default package that was created upon installation of the "Directory / Pages Plugin" (If enabled, the External Badge App will also be available to Pages created so far under the default package).
column2: Enable Embeddable Badges / Like Box for the default package that was created upon installation of the "Directory / Circles Plugin" (If enabled, the External Badge App will also be available to Circles created so far under the default package).
